00036 #pragma pack(1)
00037 struct PeptideDatabaseFormula
00038 {
00039     int C;
00040     int H;
00041     int N;
00042     int O;
00043     int S;
00044 
00045     PeptideDatabaseFormula(int c=0, int h=0, int n=0, int o=0, int s=0)
00046     :   C(c), H(h), N(n), O(o), S(s)
00047     {}
00048 };
00049 #pragma pack()
00050 
00051 
00052 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const PeptideDatabaseFormula& formula);
00053 
00054 
00055 #pragma pack(1)
00056 struct PeptideDatabaseRecord
00057 {
00058     int id_ipi;
00059     double abundance;
00060     double mass;
00061     PeptideDatabaseFormula formula;
00062     int sequenceKey;
00063 
00064     PeptideDatabaseRecord()
00065     :   id_ipi(0), abundance(1), mass(0), sequenceKey(0)
00066     {}
00067 };
00068 #pragma pack()
00069 
00070 
00071 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const PeptideDatabaseRecord& record);
00072 bool operator==(const PeptideDatabaseFormula& r, const PeptideDatabaseFormula& s);

00074 
00075 class PeptideDatabase
00076 {
00077     public:
00078 
00079     static std::auto_ptr<PeptideDatabase> create();
00080     static std::auto_ptr<const PeptideDatabase> create(const std::string& filename);
00081     virtual ~PeptideDatabase(){}
00082 
00083     virtual int size() const = 0;
00084     virtual const PeptideDatabaseRecord* records() const = 0;
00085     virtual std::string sequence(const PeptideDatabaseRecord& record) const = 0;
00086 
00087     virtual void append(const PeptideDatabaseRecord& record, const std::string& sequence = "") = 0;
00088     //virtual void append(const std::string& sequence) = 0;
00089     virtual void write(const std::string& filename) const = 0;
00090 
00091     // sortByMass() (rewriteStringTable)
00092 
00093     // iterator interface
00094     typedef const PeptideDatabaseRecord* iterator;
00095     iterator begin() const {return records();}
00096     iterator end() const {return records() + size();}
00097 
00098     // range access (binary search algorithms assume database is sorted by mass)
00099     iterator mass_lower_bound(double mass) const;
00100     iterator mass_upper_bound(double mass) const;
00101 };
